subtitle: A Full-Stack Developer Based In Taiwan
name: I'm Dylan Tsou
intro: As a web software engineer, I am passionate and dedicated to web development and related tasks. I am fascinated by web programming and have accumulated extensive work experience in this field. I am capable of independently handling UI/UX design, frontend development, as well as backend programming and database management. I am also proficient in deploying applications to the cloud. I constantly strive to acquire more skills and knowledge in this domain, and I dedicate myself to daily learning and improving my coding abilities while maintaining my passion for the field. I approach each job with a serious attitude, viewing it from the perspective of an architect, and I work hard to pave the way for my dreams.
